detail_desc: Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Short dress in a fine rib knit with a square neckline and wide shoulder straps that cross at the back. Unlined.
Slightly longer hooded jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Woven cotton blouse in a shorter style with a V-neck and concealed fastener at the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and wide, sewn-on ties at the waist.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist.
Patterned tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. 30 denier.
Set with a sleeveless dress and cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif. Dress with a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in twill with a high, paper bag waist that has a sewn-in tie belt and elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets and a back pocket. Long legs with a tab and button.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Double-layered jersey hats in a soft cotton blend.

Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
V-neck blouse in an airy weave with short, wide dolman sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Platform trainers in imitation leather and satin with lacing at the front. Mesh linings, cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles. Platform 5 cm.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boots in patterned imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and one button at the front. Lined.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool. Regular waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with a stripe down the side.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline and gathered seams at the shoulders and under the bust for a gently draping effect. Short puff sleeves with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Concealed zip at the back and a jersey-lined skirt. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with lace details, a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam under the bust with pleats and a lace trim, and a seam at the hem with a lace trim and wide, pleated flounce. Lined bodice and a short inner skirt.

Dress and hat in velour. Dress with appliqués on the front, an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening, a seam at the waist with an inset faux fur trim and a flared skirt. Faux fur trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined. Hat with a pompom on top and faux fur trim around the hem.
Short-sleeved jersey top in a viscose blend with print motifs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Studio Collection. Fully lined, high-cut bikini top. Narrow cut at the top with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, zigzag seams around the edges and decorative flatlock seams in a contrasting colour. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Calf-length dress in mesh with a low-cut back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist, a gently flared skirt and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Dress in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, long raglan sleeves and a drawstring at the waist. Soft brushed inside.
Strapless, fully lined bandeau bikini top with lightly padded cups with removable inserts and side support. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some mohair with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Fully lined, super push-up balconette bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and an elasticated hem.
Biker boots in imitation leather with an adjustable tab and metal buckle. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Waist belt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 4 cm.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit merino wool blend with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, round-necked T-shirt in ribbed organic cotton jersey.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a collar and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Imitation suede trainers with appliqués and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sleeveless top in a silk crêpe weave in a wide, gently flared style with a rounded hem.
Fitted, ankle-length dress in a rib knit containing glittery threads with a round, roll-edge neckline and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Gently tapered waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Collarless satin blouse with concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Suede mittens with a faux fur trim at the cuff. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 1 cm to 3.5 cm.
Coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Shortie briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges, a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are doubled at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short skirt in soft, stretch scuba fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side stripes.
Fitted top in soft linen jersey with long sleeves and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Adjustable anklets in various designs. One in thin metal chain, one in fabric cord with shells.
Set with an Alice band and tail in faux fur. Alice band with appliqués in the shape of ears on top. Padded tail with ribbons and a hook and loop fastening. Length of tail approx. 35 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
High-waisted shorts in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with pleats at the top, two buttons and a zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and a sturdy, detachable tie belt.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Stand-up collar, a detachable hood with covered elastication, a zip and button band with press-studs down the front and raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.

Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to long shorts. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and legs that can be folded up and fastened with a tab and button.
Imitation suede shopper with a lower section in imitation leather. Handle and magnetic fastener at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 37.5x39 cm.

Tailored trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, discreet side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.

prod_name: RC Blake Slim Fit Linen Blazer
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette. For the matching trousers, look for: 0683740.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Narrow tie in a textured weave with a text pattern. Width 6 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
